name: InMobiCMP
summary: InMobi CMP is a free leading Consent Management Platform designed for app and web publishers to foster user trust and elevating ad revenue.
description: The InMobi CMP adheres to the latest privacy regulations and is upgraded to the latest IAB Transparency & Consent Framework (TCF) v2.2 and Google CMP standards. This results in increased advertiser demand, higher monetization potential, fill rates, and eCPMs for publishers. With an intuitive interface, publishers can gain access to numerous customization options and real-time insights on consent collection, allowing them to tailor consent management according to their requirements.

license.text: License can be found here: https://www.inmobi.com/choice-terms
